author: Marissa Johnson
title: Miley Cyrus Net Worth in 2025: How Much Is the Pop Superstar Worth Now?
text:
Miley Cyrus Net Worth 2025: Miley Cyrus is the most eminent Actress, singer, and voice actress, with a net worth of around $ 160 million in 2024 . Check out Miley Cyrus’s biography, career, and net worth in this article.
Miley Cyrus is one of the most successful and highest-paid songwriters, Actresses, singers, and philanthropists who are well-known for her acting skills and unique style . In 2006, Miley Cyrus became the teen idol, appearing in the Disney Channel TV series Hannah Montana. She is considered the most selling and renowned female artist in this world who has gained much reputation in the entertainment industry. She is the most famous musician who released many music albums.
Miley Cyrus earns many big bugs, which is why she is a luxurious spender who loves to buy different kinds of expensive things. Miley Cyrus was considered the 14th most charitable personality in 2013. There are many organizations that Miley Cyrus supports, such as the Cystic fibrosis foundation, the entertainment industry foundation, the kids wish to network, Elton John AIDS Foundation, The JED Foundation, and many others.
Miley Cyrus Net Worth in 202 5 As of 2024, the most famous Miley Cyrus’s net worth is approximately $ 160 million . The majority of her fortune comes from successful concert tours, acting, and album sales. She also earned a lot of money from endorsement deals and other investment ventures. She charges more than $ 13 million per episode and she released several songs, which made him the richest.
Miley Cyrus Net Worth Miley Cyrus Biography Real Name Miley Ray Cyrus Nickname Miley Cyrus Date of Birth and Place November 23, 1992, Franklin, Tennessee Nationality American Height and weight 5’5″ and 48 kg Parents Tish Finley and Billy Ray Cyrus Siblings Noah Lindsey Cyrus, Braison Chance Cyrus, Trace Cyrus and Brandi Cyrus Source of wealth Acting, Singing, Songwriting, Endorsement deals Net worth $ 160 million Miley Cyrus’s Early life Miley Cyrus was born in Franklin, Tennessee to Tish Finley and Billy Ray Cyrus on November 23, 1992. She always smiled when she was a baby, so everybody called her Smiley. In 2008, then she legally changed her name to Miley Ray Cyrus. Miley Cyrus completed her study at Heritage Elementary school. When Cyrus was eight years old, her family shifted to Canada. She had a dream to become an Actress, so she started singing and acting lessons at Armstrong acting studio in Toronto.
Miley Cyrus Career Miley Cyrus started her acting role in her father’s TV series. Miley Cyrus started to appear in the Disney Channel TV show Hannah Montana in 2006. Then she played the great role of a teenage girl in the TV series, which was a big hit. Miley Cyrus came in her debut album, Hannah Montana 2: Meet Miley Cyrus. Also, Miley Cyrus hosted Saturday night live and starred on the MTV series Punk’d in 2011.
Moreover, Miley Cyrus starred in various films like Sex and the City 2, So undercover, LOL, and the 3D concert movie Justin Bieber: Never Say Never. After that, Miley Cyrus appeared in Rachel, Jack, and Ashley, too, an episode of the British science fiction series Black Mirror.
Miley Cyrus’s house and cars Miley Cyrus lives a luxurious lifestyle, and she firstly lived in ranch style mansion, which is 6500 sq. ft. Then, Miley Cyrus lived in a bachelorette pad in Malibu. She also has a lot of properties in Tennessee. Moreover, Miley Cyrus also has lots of expensive cars, such as a Range rover sport, two Mercedes Benz, an Infiniti G35, an ML 450 hybrid, and many others.
Miley Cyrus’s personal life Miley Cyrus started dating singer and actor named Nick Jonas in 2006. After the split, Then she was in a 9-month relationship with model Justin Gaston in 2009. After that, Miley Cyrus dated actor Patrick Schwarzenegger in 2014. Then she was married to Hemsworth in Nashville. After separating, in 2019, Miley Cyrus dated singer Cody Simpson.
Final words It has been rightly said that Miley Cyrus is the most famous and wealthiest teenage celebrity who was ranked 9th on the list of the top 20 world’s richest female singers of all time. Thanks to her dedication and experience, Miley Cyrus is becoming a successful Actress and rich day by day. Her net worth is also increasing very rapidly.
